front.title: IEEE Standards on Circuits: Definitions of Terms for Linear Signal Flow Graphs, 1960

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This glossary reprinted from Proc. IRE (USA) vol.48, no.9, Sept.1960 contains 29 definitions with footnotes mostly related to the concepts of branches, graphs, loops, nodes and paths. Two alternative algebraic expressions for the graph determinant are explained at some length.
